title: How to unsubscribe from YouTV.ua
description: You can cancel your YouTV.ua subscription online through your account settings or by contacting their support team. After canceling, you'll retain access to free channels and paid content until the end of your current billing cycle.

web.title: Unsubscribe via YouTV.ua Website
web.description:
To cancel your YouTV.ua subscription via the website:

*   Go to the YouTV.ua website and log in to your account.
*   Navigate to your Personal Account settings.
*   Find the 'Subscription' or 'Payment' section.
*   Cancel the automatic debit option to prevent future charges.
*   Confirm the cancellation to finalize the process.
*   Alternatively, manage your subscription directly through your account on the YouTV.ua website.

support.title: Contact YouTV.ua Support
support.description:
If you encounter any issues during the cancellation process, contact YouTV.ua support:

*   Contact YouTV.ua support at 0 800 600 980 (Ukraine only) or support@youtv.com.ua.

seo_text: Learn how to easily cancel your YouTV.ua subscription. Follow our step-by-step guide to manage your account and stop recurring payments. Keep enjoying free content while ending your paid subscription.
